verses.verse: A Psalm of David, when he fled from Absalom his son. Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, how are mine adversaries <S%H6862><s%> increased <S%H7231><s%>! Many <S%H7227><s%> are they that rise up against me <S%H6965><s%>.
Many <S%H7227><s%> there are that say <S%H559><s%> of my soul <S%H5315><s%>, There is no help <S%H3444><s%> for him in God <S%H430><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
But thou <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, art a shield <S%H4043><s%> about me <S%H3519><s%>; My glory and the lifter up <S%H7311><s%> of my head <S%H7218><s%>.
I cry <S%H7121><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> with my voice <S%H6963><s%>, And he answereth <S%H6030><s%> me out of his holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%>. [Selah <S%H5542><s%>]
I laid me down <S%H7901><s%> and slept <S%H3462><s%>; I awaked <S%H6974><s%>; For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sustaineth me <S%H5564><s%>.
I will not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of ten thousands <S%H7233><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> That have set <S%H7896><s%> themselves against me round about <S%H5439><s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; Save <S%H3467><s%> me <S%H430><s%>, O my God: For thou hast smitten <S%H5221><s%> all mine enemies <S%H341><s%> upon the cheek bone <S%H3895><s%>; Thou hast broken <S%H7665><s%> the teeth <S%H8127><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
Salvation <S%H3444><s%> belongeth unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Thy blessing <S%H1293><s%> be upon thy people <S%H5971><s%>. [Selah <S%H5542><s%>]
